## MapControls.setZoomLevel() method

Zooms to the desired location by the provided value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setZoomLevel(zoomLevel: number, screenTarget?: {
        x: number;
        y: number;
    } | THREE.Vector2): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  zoomLevel | number | Zoom level. |
|  screenTarget | { x: number; y: number; } \| THREE.Vector2 | Zoom target on screen. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
